name: Laralyn Webb
text: The food was outstanding! I just stumbled upon this place and was so glad that I took my friends to try it out! Everything was so delicious and the service was incredible. They gave us each a mango tea on the house! Great experience over all!

name: Kenny L
text: When I navigated to restaurant to order food, I suddenly saw these comments, which was really interesting. Today is my third time to order a meal in a restaurant. The soup dumpling tastes really delicious. I have only eaten in NY before.  I like dumplings very much, I like their seared pork shrimp very much, it is not as bad as those one-star reviews say.

name: Kim Chaves
text:
This place is ah-maz-zing!

Be sure to check it out later in the day since they make all their stuff fresh. Somethings won’t be available early in the day as they just open. The dumpling soup is my favorite (pictured in the steamer) the soup is inside the dumplings and is out of this world.

The dumplings and bao are nothing short of perfection. And you can get bao, dumplings, and the soup all for $25 and under! Do yourself a favor, go get some!

name: Myrissa Webb
text: This place was so delicious! We tried their Bao, soup dumplings, rice bowl, and mango drink! The people are so nice and hospitable! Definitely will be going back soon!

name: Dong Sun
text: My classmates and I went to eat "soup dumplings" together. It was great, especially the waiters were very friendly. I just saw a service that was rated very poorly?  Really malicious evaluation

name: Y S
text: Decent food and size for the price.  Good Service.

name: Nicole Stambaugh
text: AMAZING food and great service! Authentic food and the only place to get xiao long bao (soup dumplings) in Auburn! They are as yummy as the ones you can get at big chains like Din Tai Fung / in bigger cities. I am coming back every week! Prices are great for the quality and quantity of the food.

name: Jasmine Q Smith
text: Loved this place! My boyfriend and I love finding little hole in the wall restaurants and I just so happened to be find this place today via googling “dumplings in Auburn”😅. Kyle was helping us and was very kind and told us how the food was homemade and they haven’t been open to long. The soup dumplings were our favorite but their Pork Bao’s are a very close second. If your even considering going here just do it! You won’t be disappointed.

name: David Donica
text: Great first experience! My wife and I just moved to town and this placed just popped up. We took a shot and will definitely be a repeat visitor.💯

name: Federico Niekrasas
text: The food was delicious and is well worth the money. I got dumplings, bao (huge and delicious), rice bowl, and the amazing Bubble Tea! Would definitely recommend. The service was A++

name: Kaylee Robertson
text: Just picked up a to go order for the first time, and they let us have 2 free drinks because it was our first time! Wonderful customer service, and the bao and chicken rice bowl we had were AMAZING. Will be going back, highly recommend!!

name: Hagen Wasden
text: This was a great experience. First, the food is just amazing. We had the soup dumplings and pork bao. Second, the owner was very kind and actually gave us beef bao to try for free since this was our first time. The two one star reviews were definitely malicious because this place is great. Everybody who came in after us were treated just as well. Highly recommend!

name: Brianna Jackson
text: I don't know what some of these 1-star reviews are talking about, but the food was very good! Plus the service was very efficient. I got the pork belly rice bowl and soup dumplings, both of which tasted very authentic. If you're looking for americanized Asian food, or fusion, don't eat here. I can only assume that was the reason some reviewers gave 1-star.

name: Harrison
text: I've been seeing some mixed reviews but I got the number 1 lunch combo and it was so good. Basically Two meals in one. The sauce was so good also, definitely recommend to give a try

name: Joseph Rury
text: Ordering is simple, service is great, and the food will not disappoint. Definitely worth the price. A hidden gem

name: Clay Hodges
text: A brand new restaurant with awesome food, and so much cheer. This is our second time ordering 99 Bao and we haven't been disappointed either times. Try their dumplings, and get yourself and a friend an order of baos to share :) Also, this was the second time they threw in something a little extra with a note to thank us for ordering. So sweet, very appreciated

name: Cassidy Brydon
text: Absolutely delicious! Had the pork rice bowl, mango tea, and soup dumplings. Love it all. Definitely going back!

name: Jessie (Hyejun Jie)
text: Ordered Beef Shank Noodle Soup and Steam Bao on the first visit. Price was decent and food tasted great. Didn’t disappoint.

name: Nick Mastando
text: The lunch combo is one of the best deals in Auburn, all the food is delicious and the staff is super nice. Will definitely be coming back!

name: Kass Fowler
text: Love this place. I found it when they’d only been open for one week. Their xiao long bao (soup dumplings) are phenomenal. And you absolutely must try the Big Juicy Pork Bao—they’re fantastic. And the steamed and seared potsticker dumplings are top-notch. (I haven’t tried the entire menu yet.) All for great prices too! And the staff are awesome!

name: Blake B
text: The bao is awesome, especially the pork. The owners are very sweet.

name: Chris Adams
text: Had both pork and beef bao, steamed and fried dumplings, beef rice, and seafood bowl - all excellent. Made fresh, will be back!

name: Luke Haverkamp
text: Great dumplings! The lunch specials are awesome bang for your buck.

name: Julia Gorday
text: We ordered from 99 bao and they put sticky notes on all the dishes to let us know what each dish was and how to eat it! They also gave us free boba teas as a thank you! We all loved it the food was amazing!

name: Hongwei Chu
text: The service is fast and very good! Especially the noodle soup and Beef Bao taste delicious!

name: D'Angelo Baker
text: I am obsessed with their food. I honestly order from here too much. Highly recommend!

name: Lanqi Lanqi
text: The dumplings and beef noodles are really delicious, and the rice bowl with specially prepared sauce is also great

name: Jacob Benoit
text: Staff was extremely friendly and welcoming, and the food was delicious! Great spot!

name: wang zi
text: This is an authentic Chinese restaurant, specialized in Chinese food. They cook rice and soup in a real Chinese style. I order my breakfast and lunch here five times every week. But if you are looking sesame chicken or general tso chicken, look somewhere else. If you are looking sesame chicken or general tso chicken, go somewhere else. This is important. I think there are some American dude, they are sesame chicken kind of people, but come to this restaurant, asking the chef cook traditional Chinese noodle soup in a sesame chicken style. Sorry, it is cannot be done. This is a A+ restaurant for real Chinese dish. Specially, like Chinese breakfast bun, we call it “Bao Zi". Remember Auburn, before you go into a business, you should know what kind thing they offer and what kind thing you like. In a small town like Auburn, we all are lucky have this restaurant here. Their price is good, food good and close to campus. Thank you, your hard work means a lot to Auburn.

name: Davon Fox
text: Everything was undercooked...why do people like this?? I ordered it to go but that shouldn't mean the quality should suffer. Not much flavor either.

name: tate lauerdale
text: very good service and great food! very authentic - I have had soup dumplings many of times before and these did not disappoint!

name: Andrew Bingham
text: Great authentic food! Soup dumplings are good

name: Benjamin Webster
text: Food was fantastic and the staff were incredibly nice and helpful.

name: Hu Yuefeng
text: soup dumplings and the beef noodle soup are great. will be back .

name: Delilah Drost
text: I decided to try this since Irritable Bao downtown was so busy but trust me... THIS IS NOT WORTH IT. take the hour long wait downtown for real bao that doesn’t set off your gag reflexes.

name: Derek L
text: Super good food + really nice people!

name: Ye Lin
text: I don’t know why some people give one star , maybe the competition? Food is good

name: Sophie C
text: Sooo good. Soup dumplings are amazing.

name: SweetSuicune
text: Amazing food. Friendly place :)

name: Shelly Harrison
text: Nasty food. Tried bao and dumplings, both were gross. A couple hours later I was vomiting uncontrollably so I think this place gave me food poisoning. Won’t be going back.

name: Brian
text: Awesome

name: Miguel xum
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good

(Original)
Muy bien
